metadata.title: CVE-2024-50007 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: asihpi: Fix potential OOB array accessASIHPI driver stores some values in the static array upon a responsefrom the driver, and its index depends on the firmware.  We shouldn'ttrust it blindly.This patch adds a sanity check of the array index to fit in the arraysize.
